motd: Change: Now applies Grievous Wounds even if the damage dealt was completely mitigated by a shield.

unique_passive_1: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.
Dealing physical damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.
Dealing physical damage applies 30% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.
Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.
Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 2 seconds.
Physical damage inflicts Grievous Wounds on enemy champions for 3 seconds.
Basic attacks inflict Grievous Wounds on enemy champions for 1.5 seconds.

motd: Change: No longer removes stealth when used.

unique_passive_2: For the next 10 seconds, your damage against enemy champions inflicts 50% Grevious Wounds for 7 seconds (20 second cooldown).
For the next 10 seconds, your damage against enemy champions inflicts 50% Grevious Wounds for 8 seconds (45 second cooldown).

unique_passive_1: Damage applies Executioner's Mark on the target, dealing 4 damage per second for 8 seconds.
unique_passive_2: For the next 10 seconds, your damage against enemy champions inflicts 50% Grevious Wounds for 7 seconds (60 second cooldown).

unique_passive_1: Damage applies Executioner's Mark on the target, reducing the target's healing by 65% for 8 seconds. Deals 4 damage per second for the duration.
Damage applies Executioner's Mark on the target, reducing the target's healing by 65% for 12 seconds. Deals 4 damage per second for the duration.
Damage applies Executioner's Mark on the target, reducing the target's healing by 40% for 8 seconds.
motd: The exact gold cost is unknown.
